name: Switch Pyramid
description:
Very old-fashioned FPS, with a twist.

It should have been another ordinary day of blasting your way through a mummy-ridden pyramid, but the walls just had to start moving around...

All graphics were hand-made (using Gimp), all sound effects mouth-made (then tweaked a bit in Audacity).

Made within 2 days for the first Pot-au-jeu Game Jam. Theme : "Faire du neuf avec du vieux !"

Credit where it's due :

- 'Arcade Classic' font by Pizzadude

- In-game music by my girlfriend
